name: CAVEMAN (itch) (uidomaa)
description:
Hi folks,

Thank you for checking our game!

Inspired by caveman paintings

Paleolithic art adorns the walls of Lascaux Cave in southwest France.
PHOTOGRAPH BY COTTON COULSON, NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC CREATIVE

We wants to make simple 2.5D action adventure game using Unity texture projection 

You are a warrior living on top of a cave wall filled with prehistorical paintings.
Your tribe is over populated and running out of space.

Your mission is to help your tribe finding a place next to river for settlement.

Watch out for wild animals, because they like to chase you around

If you like the game, please rate it and give us your feedback
Add a link to your game in the comments; we want to check it out!
